title: Why does Trump want changes to automatic birthright citizenship?
shortDescription: The U.S. Supreme Court will hear arguments in May on Trump's bid to enforce his executive order to restrict automatic birthright citizenship.

title: White House allegations against Kilmar Abrego Garcia in deportation fight
shortDescription: Until now, the administration had offered no evidence in court linking him to gangs, even when prompted by a federal judge.

title: Trump floats tariff revenue as replacement for federal income tax
shortDescription: In an interview with Fox Noticias, Trump also said he wants to give money and a flight ticket to undocumented immigrants who “self-deport.”

title: Trump defers to Department of Justice on Abrego Garcia case
shortDescription: Asked if he'd take steps to bring Abrego Garcia back to the US if a judge held him in contempt, Trump replied, "Well, I'm not involved in it."

title: Deportation politics: How Trump embraces drama around Abrego Garcia
shortDescription: A court ruled that the Trump administration wrongly deported Kilmar Abrego Garcia, but the president and his advisers have been defiant.

title: Supreme Court will consider Trump's restrictions on birthright citizenship
shortDescription: The case is the first challenge to the new administration's policies that the justices have taken up for public discussion.

title: Trump predicts trade deals with China, EU amid tariff dispute
shortDescription: "There will be a trade deal 100%," Trump said ahead of a luncheon at the White House with Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni. "I fully expect it."

title: Can Trump fire Fed chair Jerome Powell?
shortDescription: Jerome Powell said the Federal Reserve could be in a "challenging scenario" with Trump's tariffs. Trump teased to fire him on Truth Social.

title: IRS may revoke Harvard's tax-exempt status | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Sen. Chris Van Hollen demanded Wednesday that Salvadoran President Nayib Bukele release Kilmar Abrego Garcia.

title: Trump slams Fed chair after Powell warns about inflation from tariffs
shortDescription: Trump lashed out on April 17 with a social media post, saying Powell "should have lowered Interest Rates... long ago, but he should certainly lower them now."

title: Trump in trouble? Stagflation, judicial contempt, and sagging polls
shortDescription: Trump has long defied political gravity. That's an asset now being put to the test.

title: Reports: IRS could soon revoke Harvard's tax-exempt status
shortDescription: The university rejected Trump's demands that it change a number of policies.

title: Trump administration threatened with criminal contempt
shortDescription: A federal district judge says there is probable cause to hold the Trump administration in criminal contempt of court over deportations.
